show_name: Dragon Ball Z: Broly - Second Coming (movie 10)
other_title: Dragon Ball Z Movie 10: Broly - Second Coming
Dragon Ball Z: A Volta do Guerreiro Brolly (Portuguese)
Dragon Ball Z: Dangerous Partners! Super Warriors Never Rest
Dragon Ball Z: El regreso de Broly (Spanish)
Dragon Ball Z: El Regreso del Guerrero Legendario (Spanish)
Dragon Ball Z: Kiken na Futari! Chō Senshi wa Nemurenai (Japanese)
Dragon Ball Z: Sfida alla leggenda (Italian)
ドラゴンボールＺ 危険なふたり！超戦士はねむれない (Japanese)
七龍珠Z 危險雙人組 (Chinese (Taiwan))
plot: After his loss to Goku, Brolly crash lands and hibernates on earth. After some time, he is awakened by Trunks and Goten, who Brolly believes is Kakarott, and goes on a rampage to kill both of them. At the same time, Gohan is on his way to challenge the Legendary Super Saiyan alone.
ending_theme: "Kiseki no Big Fight" by Hironobu Kageyama
